I’ve specialised in producing simple yet meaningful solutions to a variety of digital tasks, by creating engaging digital experiences that better connect companies with their audience.

What Do I Do?

  • Front-End Development

    This involves converting the visual design of a website into a user friendly design.

  • Mobile App Design

    This involves creating usable & intuitive mobile app user interfaces.

  • Website Design

    This is the process of planning, conceptualising, and arranging content online.

  • Website Audit

    This is a complete analysis of all factors that affect a website's visibility in search engines.

  • Digital Marketing

    This is the promotion of brands using modern technologies to reach consumers.

  • Graphic Design

    This is the process of communicating ideas using multiple types of visual media.

How Do I Work?

  • Briefing

    Understanding the problem has always been the forefront of my process. I consider project briefing as the most important stage as erroneous understanding can lead to misguided designs.

  • Strategy

    Clients come with different takes; some say they know what they want, and some might have no idea. Whatever their take may be, I always ask for their objective, and dive deep to understand what can solve their problem.

  • Design → Review → Iteration

    From wireframes to high-fidelity designs, I take client engagement in high regard. Reviews and feedback make part in the success of the project. Necessary iterations can take place until we achieve the final desired solution.

What Don't I Do?

Run in public. Fall gracefully. Understand how time travel works. Wear anything other than black. Skip queues. Run with scissors. Know how to whistle with two fingers.

When I'm not working, I write about personal tech and listen to audiobooks & podcasts. I'm a minimalist, a nonconformist, a DIYer, and an old soul.

Hire me,
or just say hello!
